item.title: Public RPC Endpoints
item.description: How to Customize Your Endpoint (e.g. MetaMask) To change your endpoint in MetaMask, do the following, filling in the fields from the table below: Click on the Networks drop-down menu, then press Add Network Under the Network Name field, write <Network Name> Pocket Portal Within the New RPC URL field, copy and paste <RPC URL> (Optional) Put <ChainID> in the ChainID field (Optional) Write <Symbol> as the Symbol (Optional) Add <Explorer URL> as the Block Explorer URL Donâ€™t forget to save Info If you receive this error message from MetaMask Invalid number.

item.title: Get An Endpoint
item.description: Pocket Portal The Pocket Portal lets you create an endpoint for the chain you want in just a few clicks and provides you with the features you’ve come to expect in centralized API services, such as usage/uptime metrics and notifications/alerts. Setup Guide Go to the Pocket Portal, sign up and verify your email. Once you’ve done so, log in and you’ll be greeted by the Network Overview section. Info In this section, you’ll see all the important parts of the network: how many relays are being served daily, the overall success rate of the network, and the number of apps, nodes, and POKT staked.
